snippet.title: Cozy Dungeons - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Get a deep dive into Cozy Dungeons in this trailer for the upcoming single-player adventure/interior design game. The trailer gives us a look at the tutorial dungeon and what you can expect from the gameplay of Cozy Dungeons. Explore dungeons, clear them out of enemies, and renovate them for a profit. After all, why just conquer a dungeon when you can turn it into a B&B? Cozy Dungeons will be available on PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch in 2025.
